text: Mata,`arra ga anata gata ni sadzuke rareta mono o, hodokose.' To iwa reru to, fushinjin'na mono wa shinko suru mono ni iu. `Arra ga o nozominara,(o jibun de) yashinawa reru to iu mono o, doshite watashi-tachi ga yashinau koto ga arimashou ka. Anata gata wa, akiraka ni omoichigai o shite iru dakedesu
